messages.subject: Re: Apology
messages.msgSnippet: There is no need to apologize. I would also like to add that this is a very instructive example of how one should cite textual resources when providing new
messages.messageBody:
There is no need to apologize.
I would also like to add that this is a very instructive example of
how one should cite textual resources when providing new info.
secretarytocapt3
(still trying to deal with dozens of books she has to read)

wrote:

message

and did

training, this is
> a true shame on me, and for that, I humbly ask your forgiveness.
I'll try

> --M.

messages.subject: Apology
messages.msgSnippet: I m sorry, everyone. In my rush out the door I received that email message about the alleged truth behind the Hitokiri Battousai s existence, and did not
messages.messageBody:
I'm sorry, everyone. In my rush out the door I received that email message
about the alleged truth behind the Hitokiri Battousai's existence, and did
not bother to read through it carefully. As a historian-in-training, this is
a true shame on me, and for that, I humbly ask your forgiveness. I'll try
not to be so stupid from now on.

--M.
